page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE...
page.content: On Monday while I waited for the kettle to boil, I watched a video,and Mum gave me toast and marmalade.I got my school things together and biked up our lane to meet the scool taxi.It also called for Helen,Elizabeth and Scott at the Forest. In the classroom I gave in my dinner money.After assembly we all got on with our maths.Valerie and I did handstands at playtime.Then I wrote about when my Dad,my sister Michelle and I went to a forest and saw a squirrel.School dinner was fish fingers,chips,tomatoes and peas,then rainbow cake and custard. After school the taxi dropped me at the end of the lane and I rode home for tea.I watched some television before going outside to practice gymnastics.Then I had a bath and read.
